document.heading: UDC Board Meeting Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-251, the “UDC Board Meeting Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-694. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Dec. 4, 2012, and Dec. 18, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Jan. 7, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-588 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-251 became effective on Mar. 19, 2013.
